headline.main: Arrival of the U.S. Frigate Powhatan.; LIST OF OFFICERS

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States steam-frigate Powhatan, Capt. SAMUEL MERCER, from Vera Cruz 25th ult., and Havana the 8th inst., arrived and anchored off the Battery at 3 o'clock yesterday afternoon. The ship appears in a very creditable condition, considering her long cruise in the hot climate of the Gulf.

headline.main: AFFAIRS OF THE NATION.; INTERESTING FROM THE FEDERAL CAPITAL Appointments Made and to be Made. Inquiry in the Senate as to the Condition of the Southern Forts. Proposition to Strike the Names of Seeding Senators from the Roll.Noting New Relative to Fort Sumpter.HIGHLY IMPORTANT FROM TEXAS.Governor Houston at Issue withthe Secessionists.He Opposes the Southern Confederacyand Proposes to Raise Troops onhis own Account.OUR WASHINGTON DISPATCHES. MR. CLAY AND THE SPANISH MISSION. MR. CORWIN'S ACCEPTANCE. THE FOREIGN MISSION APPOINTMENTS. THE BRAZILIAN MISSION. APPOINTMENTS AND PROBABLE APPOINTMENTS. PRESSURE OF THE PATRIOTS. MR. CAMERON AND THE WAR DEPARTMENT. THE SECESSION MOVEMENT IN TEXAS. SAM HOUSTON AND SECESSION IN TEXAS. CALFORNIA APPOINTMENTS. THE SAN FRANCISCO BRANCH MINT. CONSEQUENCES OF SUCH APPOINTMENTS. OTHER CALIFORNIA APPOINTMENTS. CESSATION OF THE BUTTERFIELD SERVICE. WIGFALL AND CAPT. JACKSON.

docs.snippet: The Army Register for 1861 bas been issued. It gives the total enlisted men of the army at 17,005; agrregate, 18,122. There are 198 companies in the different regiments. If all these were serving on distant stations, the total enlisted would be...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Army Register for 1861 bas been issued. It gives the total enlisted men of the army at 17,005; agrregate, 18,122. There are 198 companies in the different regiments. If all these were serving on distant stations, the total enlisted would be 17,549; and the aggregate, 18,666.

headline.main: CITY AND COUNTY AFFAIRS.; BOARD OF ALDERMEN. A BONUS FOR HACKLEY FREE DUMPING GROUNDS THE TAX LEVY PASSED AS RECOMMENDED BY THE CONFERENCE COMMITTEE. THE TAX-LEVY. WHO PAYS FOR TRAP BLOCK PAVEMENT? RECEPTION OF HON. JOHN A. DIX. THE CROTON WATER-WORKS. THE NEW STREET-CLEANING CONTRACT. PAPERS FROM THE COUNCILMEN. HOW CITY CONTRACTS ARE FULFILLED. A NEW STEAM FIRE-ENGINE.

docs.lead_paragraph: At the meeting of the Board of Aldermen last evening, the question came up from the Councilmen on the resolution granting the use of the dumping grounds of the City to Mr. Hackley, the contractor for cleaning the streets, for an unlimited space of time.

docs.snippet: Coroner SCHIAMER yesterday investigated the circumstances attending the death of Caroline King a married woman, 21 years of age, residing at No. 21 Forsyth street, who took corresive sublimate on Friday last, with the object of suicide.

headline.main: Coroner's Inquests.; SUICIDE OF A YOUNG MARRIED WOMAN.

docs.lead_paragraph: Coroner SCHIAMER yesterday investigated the circumstances attending the death of Caroline King a married woman, 21 years of age, residing at No. 21 Forsyth street, who took corresive sublimate on Friday last, with the object of suicide.
